definition: scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)
to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll
a Chinese foot/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a tape-measure/one of the three acupoints for measuring pulse in Chinese medicine/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3]
one of the characters used to represent a musical note in gongche notation, 工尺譜|工尺谱[gong1 che3 pu3]

sentences.english: Don't hold your breath or cinch the tape too tight.
sentences.chinese: 不要屏住呼息，也不要把卷尺勒的太紧。

sentences.english: Place a tape measure around your bare abdomen just above your hipbone.
sentences.chinese: 袒露出你的肚子，用卷尺在胯骨之上环绕一圈。

sentences.english: I bought a steel tape and a tap in the hardware store.
sentences.chinese: 我在五金店买了一个钢卷尺和一只水龙头。

sentences.english: The difference between both clavicles was also measured clinically with a tape.
sentences.chinese: 以及临床使用卷尺同时测量两侧锁骨之间的差异。

sentences.english: Measure the total length of the tension cable from centre of eyelet to centre of eyelet with a tape measure .
sentences.chinese: 用卷尺测量张紧拉线孔眼中心之间的整体长度。

sentences.english: Langdon challenged. “Next time you're in the shower, take a tape measure.”
sentences.chinese: 兰登反驳，“下次你们洗澡的时候，带上一根卷尺。”

sentences.english: A brand-new automatic zero-cutting system of steel tape is designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一种全新的钢卷尺自动切零位系统。

sentences.english: Detective this profession I don't really understand, they often use magnifier or tape measure?
sentences.chinese: 侦探这行业我不太了解，他们常使用放大镜或卷尺吧？

sentences.english: Use the tape to measure and adjust the level of the cabinet by the reference line.
sentences.chinese: 再用卷尺以基准线为标准，测量调试吊柜水平。

sentences.english: The carpenter extended the measuring tape as far as it would go.
sentences.chinese: 木匠把卷尺拉长到不能再拉为止。

sentences.english: Measure the total length of the tension cable from eyelet to eyelet with a tape measure .
sentences.chinese: 用卷尺测量张紧拉线孔眼之间的整体长度。

sentences.english: South Korea KOMELON steel-ball club, mainly for the production of high-grade tape.
sentences.chinese: 韩国KOMELON珠式会社，主要为生产高档卷尺。

sentences.english: If you're looking for specific square footage, bring a tape measure.
sentences.chinese: 如果你要房子的确切面积，就自带一个卷尺。

definition: set square (tool to measure right angles)
level (device to determine horizontal)/spirit level/surveyor's level
level (device to determine horizontal)/spirit level/surveyor's level
